A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Faithful to the saga but Rey is so wasted\, or perhaps saved for the big battle in the last chapter. She has nearly no role to play in preparation for the finale. This is in general true for all the leads on both the sides\, as they are pulled back from big battles to remain intact for now. In the absence of major warfares involving the young\, more could have been done with both Luke and Snoke. Overall\, spectacular and engaging.
